commands.name: az mobile-network attached-data-network create
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network attached-data-network create --adn-name
                                               --data-interface
                                               --dns-addresses
                                               --pccp-name
                                               --pcdp-name
                                               --resource-group
                                               [--address-pool]
                                               [--location]
                                               [--napt-configuration]
                                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                               [--static-address-pool]
                                               [--tags]
examples: az mobile-network attached-data-network create -n data-network-name -g rg --pccp-name pccp-name --pcdp-name pcdp-name --dns-addresses "[1.1.1.1]" --data-interface " {name:N2,ipv4Address:10.28.128.2,ipv4Subnet:10.28.128.0/24,ipv4Gateway:10.28.128.1}" --address-pool "[2.2.0.0/16]"

commands.name: az mobile-network attached-data-network delete
commands.summary: Delete the specified attached data network.
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network attached-data-network delete [--adn-name]
                                               [--ids]
                                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                               [--pccp-name]
                                               [--pcdp-name]
                                               [--resource-group]
                                               [--subscription]
                                               [--yes]
examples: az mobile-network attached-data-network delete -n data-network-name --pccp-name pccp-name --pcdp-name pcdp-name -g rg -y

commands.name: az mobile-network attached-data-network list
commands.summary: List all the attached data networks associated with a packet core data plane.
examples: az mobile-network attached-data-network list -g rg --pccp-name pccp-name --pcdp-name pcdp-name

commands.name: az mobile-network attached-data-network show
commands.summary: Get information about the specified attached data network.
examples: az mobile-network attached-data-network show -n data-network-name --pccp-name pccp-name --pcdp-name pcdp-name -g rg

commands.name: az mobile-network attached-data-network update
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network attached-data-network update [--add]
                                               [--address-pool]
                                               [--adn-name]
                                               [--data-interface]
                                               [--dns-addresses]
                                               [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                               [--ids]
                                               [--napt-configuration]
                                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                               [--pccp-name]
                                               [--pcdp-name]
                                               [--remove]
                                               [--resource-group]
                                               [--set]
                                               [--static-address-pool]
                                               [--subscription]
                                               [--tags]
examples: az mobile-network attached-data-network update -n data_network-name -g rg --pccp-name pccp-name --pcdp-name pcdp-name --tags "{tag:test,tag2:test2}"

commands.name: az mobile-network attached-data-network wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
